iep_goals: Initiate and maintain appropriate social interactions with peers for 15-minute periods in 8 out of 10 opportunities
Use appropriate nonverbal communication and personal space during conversations with 80% accuracy
accommodations: Advance notice of changes in routine or schedule
Quiet space available for breaks when overwhelmed
Modified group work with clear role definitions
Written instructions to supplement verbal directions
learning_styles: excels with structured, predictable learning environments
benefits from detailed written instructions and examples

interviews.parent: Parent reports Maya is academically gifted but struggles with social situations and becomes anxious with unexpected changes.
interviews.teacher: Maya produces exceptional academic work but has difficulty with group projects and peer interactions.

observations.psychologist: Superior intellectual abilities with challenges in social communication and flexibility. Benefits from structured social learning opportunities.
